Text:
Excellent, i love you. ive been searching the house for my old guide and here it is!

this is Bradygames official guide. thanks so much for this

ZOMG AWESOME even if it is a few years old!
Cheers!Thank you! Danke!Gracias!Shukran!Arigat么!Spasiba!Merci!Mahalo!Takk!

Ah, I'm so happy this is on here!  I'm playing through FFX on an emu now for the first time since playing it 7 years ago, and I've been tearing apart my house looking my copy of this book and I was sure there was no way I could use it... thanks!
I notice in the bestiary there are inaccuracies as well as one missing Flan monster.  ANyone else notice anything like that?  stoopid Bradygames

Thanks heaps, been looking for a while. Great quality, although the OCR tends to make mistakes interpreting words. But otherwise, great upload, thanks a lot WestenFeldt.

PS. I don't believe the guide is for the 2nd international version ( or which ever has dark aeons) as i read nothing about dark aeons in it.
oh yea, please seed after you download. I always seed to a 4.000 ratio :D
